title: Typeface for perfumes: Chanel No5, CK Obsession and YSL Opium
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know the typefaces that are used in Chanel No 5, Calvin Klein Obsession and Yves Saint Laurent's Opium perfumes?

Obsession: [http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/31AKuqDjJdL.\_SL500\_AA280\_.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218133053/http:/ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/31AKuqDjJdL._SL500_AA280_.jpg "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/31AKuqDjJdL.\_SL500\_AA280\_.jpg")  
Chanel No 5: [http://www.cheap-perfume.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2008/02/chanel-no-5.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218133053/http:/www.cheap-perfume.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2008/02/chanel-no-5.jpg "http://www.cheap-perfume.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2008/02/chanel-no-5.jpg")  
Opium: [http://img2.timeinc.net/instyle/images/2006/products/November/BFF/101106...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218133053/http:/img2.timeinc.net/instyle/images/2006/products/November/BFF/101106_yvessaintlaurent_a.jpg "http://img2.timeinc.net/instyle/images/2006/products/November/BFF/101106\_yvessaintlaurent\_a.jpg")

Also, if you know the typefaces used in ANY other famous perfumes, I'd love to know.

Thank you so much in advance.
author: monkchild

comments.content:
Sorry to burst your bubble, but most famous perfumes have custom designed logos.

That being said, [Perpetua Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218133053/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontlist/alternatives/trajan/?&sample_text=OBSESSION) comes pretty close to Obsession, and you can approximate the Chanel logo with [H&FJ Gotham](http://web.archive.org/web/20150218133053/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100008).
